subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. owners unanimously voted Wednesday to scrap the 2-3-2 finals format and return to 2-2-1-1-1, believing the travel inconveniences teams faced 30 years ago no longer exist.
snippet: N.B.A. owners unanimously voted Wednesday to scrap the 2-3-2 finals format and return to 2-2-1-1-1, believing the travel inconveniences teams faced 30 years ago no longer exist.
